p: Furthermore, some adaptogenic plants, such as Panax ginseng C.A. Meyer, Astragalus membranaceous (Fisch.) Bge., and Withania somnifera (L.) Dunal can indirectly stimulate the immune system, through improving the resistance to stress [ 35, 45]. Indeed, ginseng has been reported able to prevent several diseases through modulating the immune system and gut microbiome, thus suggesting its usefulness as an immunity boosting dietary supplement [ 36]. Similarly, the immunomodulatory properties of W. somnifera and its constituent withaferin A have been reported [ 39]. At last, preliminary studies have highlighted the immunomodulatory effects of other medicinal plants, such as Asparagus racemosus Willd., Azadirachta indica A. Juss., Artocarpus tonkinensis A. Chev. Ex Gagnep, Syzigium aromaticum (L.) Merr. and L.M. Perry and Hypoxis rooperi T. Moore [ 26, 33, 37, 46, 47].
